codeList:
from pymilvus import MilvusClient

client = MilvusClient(
    uri='http://localhost:19530', # replace with your own Milvus server address
    token='root:Milvus' # replace with your own Milvus server token
)
client.create_user(
    user_name='user_1',
    password='P@ssw0rd'
)
client.update_password(
    user_name='user_1',
    old_password='P@ssw0rd',
    new_password='P@ssw0rd123'
)
client.list_users()

# output:
# ['root', 'user_1']
client.describe_user(user_name='user_1')

# output:
# {'user_name': 'user_1', 'roles': ()}
client.create_role(
    role_name="roleA",
)
client.list_roles()

# output:
# ['admin', 'public', 'roleA']
# grant privilege to a role

client.grant_privilege(
    role_name='roleA',
    object_type='User',  # value here can be Global, Collection or User, object type also depends on the API defined in privilegeName
    object_name='user_1',  # value here can be * or a specific user name if object type is 'User'
    privilege='SelectUser'
)
client.describe_role(
    role_name='roleA'
)

# output:
# {'role': 'roleA',
#  'privileges': [{'object_type': 'User',
#    'object_name': 'user_1',
#    'db_name': 'default',
#    'role_name': 'roleA',
#    'privilege': 'SelectUser',
#    'grantor_name': 'root'}]}
# grant a role to a user

client.grant_role(
    user_name='user_1',
    role_name='roleA'
)
client.describe_user(
    user_name='user_1'
)

# output:
# {'user_name': 'user_1', 'roles': ('roleA')}
client.revoke_privilege(
    role_name='roleA',
    object_type='User',  # value here can be Global, Collection or User, object type also depends on the API defined in privilegeName
    object_name='user_1',  # value here can be * or a specific user name if object type is 'User'
    privilege='SelectUser'
)
client.revoke_role(
    user_name='user_1',
    role_name='roleA'
)
client.drop_role(role_name='roleA')
client.drop_user(user_name='user_1')
